mapper.select:
select m.idmonitoria as monid, m.dia as mdia, m.horainicio as mhorainicio, m.horafin as mhorafin, m.lugar as mlugar
from monitoria as m where #{id} = (select g.monitor_persona_id from grupo as g where m.grupo_idgrupo = g.idgrupo and g.semestre_numero = (select MAX(s.numero) from semestre as s))

select m.idmonitoria as monid, m.dia as mdia, m.horainicio as mhorainicio, m.horafin as mhorafin, m.lugar as mlugar
from monitoria as m where #{id} = (select g.monitor_persona_id from grupo as g where m.grupo_idgrupo = g.idgrupo and g.semestre_numero = (select MAX(s.numero) from semestre as s)) and current_time between m.horainicio and m.horafin and (((select extract(dow from current_date))=1 and m.dia like 'lunes') or ((select extract(dow from current_date))=2 and m.dia like 'martes') or ((select extract(dow from current_date))=3 and m.dia like 'miercoles') or ((select extract(dow from current_date))=4 and m.dia like 'jueves') or ((select extract(dow from current_date))=5 and m.dia like 'viernes'))

select m.idmonitoria as monid, m.dia as mdia, m.horainicio as mhorainicio, m.horafin as mhorafin, m.lugar as mlugar
from monitoria as m where #{semestre} = (select g.semestre_numero from grupo as g where m.grupo_idgrupo = g.idgrupo)

select distinct fecha from monitoriaregistrada as mr, monitoria as mo, grupo as g where mr.monitoria_idmonitoria = mo.idmonitoria and mo.grupo_idgrupo = g.idgrupo and g.curso_id = #{curso} and g.semestre_numero = #{semestre}

select count(a.idasesoria) from asesoria as a,monitoriaregistrada as mr, monitoria as mo, grupo as g where mr.monitoria_idmonitoria = mo.idmonitoria and mo.grupo_idgrupo = g.idgrupo and a.monitoriaregistrada = mr.idmonitoriaregistrada and g.curso_id = #{curso} and g.semestre_numero = #{semestre} and mr.fecha = #{fecha}

select count(a.idasesoria) from asesoria as a, monitoriaregistrada as mr, monitoria as mo where a.monitoriaregistrada = mr.idmonitoriaregistrada and mr.monitoria_idmonitoria = mo.idmonitoria and mo.idmonitoria = #{monitoria}

select m.idmonitoria as monid, m.dia as mdia, m.horainicio as mhorainicio, m.horafin as mhorafin, m.lugar as mlugar
from monitoria as m where m.grupo_idgrupo = #{grupo}
mapper.insert: insert into monitoria (grupo_idgrupo, dia, horainicio, horafin, lugar) values( #{grupo},#{dia}, #{inicio}, #{fin}, #{lugar})
